articles.author: Daisy Ruth
articles.title: CM Punk & Paul Heyman Reunite, Join Cody Rhodes Against The Bloodline On WWE SmackDown - Wrestling Inc.
articles.description: CM Punk briefly reunited with Paul Heyman before joining Undisputed WWE Champion Cody Rhodes to challenge the Bloodline on an episode of &#34;WWE SmackDown.&#34;
articles.content: CM Punk reunited with his former advocate Paul Heyman briefly during Friday's episode of "WWE SmackDown" in front of his hometown crowd in Chicago, Illinois after interfering in rival Drew McIntyre's… [+1876 chars]
